name: Snyk Security
description: Easily find and fix security issues in your applications leveraging Snyk platform capabilities.
long_description:
Snyk MCP enables AI assistants to perform comprehensive security scanning on code, dependencies, infrastructure, and containers. Integrate Snyk's security capabilities directly into your AI-assisted development workflow to proactively identify and fix vulnerabilities during code generation and review.

Supported scanning types:
- **SAST (Static Application Security Testing)**: Analyze source code for security vulnerabilities
- **SCA (Software Composition Analysis)**: Detect vulnerabilities in open source dependencies
- **IaC (Infrastructure as Code)**: Find security misconfigurations in cloud infrastructure
- **Container Security**: Scan container images for vulnerabilities
- **SBOM/AIBOM**: Generate and test Software/AI Bills of Materials

prompts.name: security_code_review
prompts.text: Use the snyk_code_scan tool to scan ${arguments.path} for security vulnerabilities. Identify any issues found and suggest fixes.

prompts.name: scan_dependencies
prompts.description: Scan project dependencies for security vulnerabilities
prompts.text: Use the snyk_sca_scan tool to scan ${arguments.path} for dependency vulnerabilities. Report any critical or high severity issues found.

prompts.name: fix_vulnerabilities
prompts.description: Scan and fix security vulnerabilities in the project
prompts.text: Use the snyk_code_scan and snyk_sca_scan tools to scan ${arguments.path} for security vulnerabilities, then automatically fix any issues that have available remediation.
